Discharge Time (s).description: Time taken to discharge the battery in seconds

Decrement 3.6-3.4V (s).description: Time taken for the voltage to decrease from 3.6V to 3.4V in seconds

Max. Voltage Dischar. (V).description: Maximum voltage during discharge in Volts

Min. Voltage Charg. (V).description: Minimum voltage during charging in Volts

Time constant current (s).description: Time at which the current remains constant in seconds

Charging time (s).description: Time taken to charge the battery in seconds

RUL.description: Remaining useful life of the battery

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in battery life prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the battery discharge and charge cycles, please predict the remaining useful life (RUL).
prompt.answer_prompt: The remaining useful life is {RUL} cycles.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in battery discharge analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the battery discharge and charge cycles, please predict the discharge time.
prompt.answer_prompt: The discharge time is {Discharge Time (s)} seconds.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in battery charge analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the battery discharge and charge cycles, please predict the charging time.
prompt.answer_prompt: The charging time is {Charging time (s)} seconds.
